text: Randall David "Randy" Johnson (born September 10, 1963) was a pitcher in Major League Baseball (MLB). He pitched for the Montreal Expos, Seattle Mariners, Houston Astros, Arizona Diamondbacks, New York Yankees, and San Francisco Giants. He was chosen to 10 All Star teams, and won five Cy Young Awards. He became a member of the Baseball Hall of Fame in 2015. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:American Christians Category:American League All-Stars Category:American photographers Category:Arizona Diamondbacks players Category:Baseball players from California Category:Houston Astros players Category:Living people Category:Montreal Expos players Category:National Baseball Hall of Fame members Category:National League All- Stars Category:New York Yankees players Category:San Francisco Giants players Category:Seattle Mariners players
title: Randy Johnson
